mapper.insert: insert into psy_user_liked_consult(user_id, consult_id, create_time) values(#{userId}, #{consultId}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: delete from psy_user_liked_consult where consult_id = #{consultId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from psy_user_liked_consult where consult_id = #{consultId} and user_id = #{userId}
select a.create_time, a.consult_id, b.nicK_name consult_name, b.avatar, b.info, b.mode from psy_user_liked_consult a inner join psy_consult b on a.consult_id = b.id where a.user_id = #{userId}
